nodes.text: Nubia Star Drives, Inc., also referred to as Nubian Design Collective, was a manufacturing company. It notably produced the J-type 327 Nubian starship, the T-14 hyperdrive generator and certain sublight engines. Although its unique spaceframe was built in the Nabooan city of Theed, the Royal Starship used by Queen Amidala was technically a modified Nubian Design Collective starship.
